site.title: AlgoRhythmics
site.tagline: Ideas in sync with human rhythm
site.description: An AI craft studio shaping the NodeVoyage travel co-pilot and the Ideonautix founder cockpit.

hero.tagline: One calm constellation linking NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and hands-on consulting.
hero.subtitle: We choreograph understandable AI rituals—from travel copilots to founder dashboards—with glass-shell poise.
hero.description: Our layouts honour reduced-motion settings, signage discipline, and AAA contrast so every collaborator stays in control across NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and studio engagements.
pillars: Story-led OS windows keep NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and consulting in one Aurora Mist ecosystem.
Motion, focus, and colour tokens default to gentle transitions and AAA ratios for clarity.
Explainable automation blends signage craftsmanship with cloud tooling for trusted launches.

nodevoyage.copy: Travel companion with OS-inspired itineraries, offline muscle, and transparent suggestions.

ideonautix.copy: Founder OS with modular rituals, venture analytics, and honest automation.

focus.title: Calm OS rituals across products
focus.description: We maintain a shared rhythm for timing, colour, and accessibility so teams feel at home on every surface.
points: OS shells read clearly in light, dark, and high-contrast modes.
Reduced-motion fallbacks keep key context visible when animations pause.
Signage research meets cloud delivery so automation stays accountable.

hero.brand_aria: AlgoRhythmics logomark highlighted in the hero heading

story.title: Our Story
story.reality_text: We craft OS-native experiences that make travel planning and founder rituals feel calmer and more transparent.
story.mission_text: Deliver explainable, accessible AI platforms that keep humans in the loop across journeys, startups, and consulting partnerships.
story.vision_text: By 2026, a shared design language where frosted glass, grain, and motion support focus while NodeVoyage and Ideonautix run on one trusted operating system.

founders.title: Meet the Founders
founders.subtitle: Two makers blending signage R&D with human-first AI

nikita.name: Nikita Jurtaevs
nikita.bio: Nikita guides AlgoRhythmics as CEO, shaping narrative arcs and steering product direction for NodeVoyage and Ideonautix. He pairs studio building with Reclame Fabriek’s signage lab so tactile experiments graduate into launch-ready digital journeys.
nikita.current_position: Reclame Fabriek — leading LED neon, controller, coating, and 3D fabrication programs that set our product standards.

slaff.name: Vjaceslavs "Slaff" Trosins
slaff.bio: Slaff architects the cloud stack, data flows, and AI integrations powering NodeVoyage and Ideonautix. His signage-controller engineering inside Reclame Fabriek’s innovation unit keeps delivery resilient and explainable.
slaff.position: Reclame Fabriek — evolving controller hardware, LED systems, and production tooling that feed real-world needs into our software.
slaff.philosophy: Systems thinking across hardware and software keeps decisions grounded; shop-floor validation informs every digital release.
achievements: Runs a Google Cloud–first stack with SvelteKit, Flutter, Fastify, Prisma/PostgreSQL, and realtime messaging.
Aligns signage-grade controllers and LED pipelines with accessible, explainable AI journeys.
Leads funding sprints for NodeVoyage and Ideonautix while recruiting multi-disciplinary talent.
slaff.brand_intro: Partnered with global brands on premium advertising display systems:
slaff.brand_context: Projects delivered through Reclame Fabriek (Daugavpils, LV) by both founders
slaff.algorhythmics_vision: Blend signage precision with cloud agility so AlgoRhythmics ships trustworthy, installation-ready AI experiences.

ai_companion.greeting: Hey! I'm Lumen, your AlgoRhythmics companion. Ask about the lab, our products, or how we can collaborate on AI adventures.

suggestions.title: Explore our AI lab
suggestions.prompt: What sets AlgoRhythmics apart from other AI studios?

suggestions.title: NodeVoyage platform
suggestions.prompt: Give me the highlights of the NodeVoyage travel platform.

suggestions.title: Ideonautix suite
suggestions.prompt: How does the Ideonautix productivity suite support teams?

suggestions.title: Improve my AI strategy
suggestions.prompt: How could AlgoRhythmics level up our AI initiative?

knowledgeBase.answer: AlgoRhythmics pairs workshop-grade engineering with playful motion design. We operate as an invention studio, shipping our own flagships while coaching partners to adopt the same R&D rituals.
NodeVoyage is our intelligent travel experience platform. Graph-powered itineraries, dynamic storytelling, and adaptive agents combine to build trips that feel personal and delightfully surprising.
Ideonautix is a constellation of collaborative AI copilots for knowledge teams. It orchestrates ideation sessions, decision intelligence, and ambient automation so focus stays on high-value thinking.
Reach our consulting crew via the contact page or by emailing hello@algorhythmics.com. We love shaping proofs of concept and long-term partnerships alike.
Begin with a discovery sprint: we map your goals, audit current data flows, and prototype a focused AI assist. Together we design experimentation loops so momentum continues well beyond launch.

ai_companion.fallback: I'm still learning, yet I can link you to the team or share highlights about our products, lab culture, and services.
